items.creator: Brian Windhorst
items.title: Why no NBA team has been as devoid of options as the Phoenix Suns
items.dc:creator: Brian Windhorst
items.content: On the heels of a sweep, the present and future are bleak in Phoenix. Where do the hampered Suns possibly go from here?
items.contentSnippet: On the heels of a sweep, the present and future are bleak in Phoenix. Where do the hampered Suns possibly go from here?

items.creator: Adam Teicher
items.title: Source: Chiefs, Kelce agree to 2-year extension
items.dc:creator: Adam Teicher
items.content: The Chiefs and star tight end Travis Kelce have agreed to a two-year contract extension.
items.contentSnippet: The Chiefs and star tight end Travis Kelce have agreed to a two-year contract extension.

items.creator: Ryan Clark
items.title: Kraken fire Hakstol after Year 3 dive, playoff miss
items.dc:creator: Ryan Clark
items.content: Dave Hakstol, who had a 107-112-27 record and took the Kraken to the playoffs in just the franchise's second year, was fired after not making the postseason in Year 3.
items.contentSnippet: Dave Hakstol, who had a 107-112-27 record and took the Kraken to the playoffs in just the franchise's second year, was fired after not making the postseason in Year 3.

items.creator: Andreas Hale
items.title: Tyson vs. Paul will be sanctioned pro fight
items.dc:creator: Andreas Hale
items.content: Jake Paul and Mike Tyson's July 20 heavyweight clash will be classified as a sanctioned, professional fight by the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulations with the outcome affecting their professional records.
items.contentSnippet: Jake Paul and Mike Tyson's July 20 heavyweight clash will be classified as a sanctioned, professional fight by the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulations with the outcome affecting their professional records.

items.creator: Dan Murphy
items.title: UAB becomes first D-I football team to join PA
items.dc:creator: Dan Murphy
items.content: The UAB football team became the first in Division I to sign on with Athletes.org, a budding players' association.
items.contentSnippet: The UAB football team became the first in Division I to sign on with Athletes.org, a budding players' association.

items.creator: Alexa Philippou
items.title: All-Pac-12 guard von Oelhoffen commits to USC
items.dc:creator: Alexa Philippou
items.content: Talia von Oelhoffen, a graduate transfer from Oregon State and two-time All-Pac-12 guard, told ESPN Monday she has committed to USC.
items.contentSnippet: Talia von Oelhoffen, a graduate transfer from Oregon State and two-time All-Pac-12 guard, told ESPN Monday she has committed to USC.

items.creator: Todd Archer
items.title: Sources: Elliott, Cowboys reunite on 1-year deal
items.dc:creator: Todd Archer
items.content: After a year apart, running back Ezekiel Elliott will return to the Dallas Cowboys on a one-year deal with a maximum value of $3 million, sources told ESPN.
items.contentSnippet: After a year apart, running back Ezekiel Elliott will return to the Dallas Cowboys on a one-year deal with a maximum value of $3 million, sources told ESPN.

items.creator: Jeff Borzello and Jonathan Givony
items.title: UConn lands Saint Mary's transfer Mahaney
items.dc:creator: Jeff Borzello and Jonathan Givony
items.content: Saint Mary's transfer Aidan Mahaney, one of the best available guards in the portal, has committed to UConn, he told ESPN.
items.contentSnippet: Saint Mary's transfer Aidan Mahaney, one of the best available guards in the portal, has committed to UConn, he told ESPN.

items.creator: Cesar Hernandez
items.title: Source: Wrexham owners invest in Liga MX team
items.dc:creator: Cesar Hernandez
items.content: Hollywood stars and Wrexham owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have bought a minority stake in Liga MX's Necaxa, a source has confirmed to ESPN.
items.contentSnippet: Hollywood stars and Wrexham owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have bought a minority stake in Liga MX's Necaxa, a source has confirmed to ESPN.

items.title: Should Spurs have been given a penalty and Arsenal's second goal disallowed?

items.title: Rúben Amorim is one of the best young coaches around. So why didn't Liverpool or Barça hire him?
